content.text:
# Highbury East (ward)

|frame=yes|plain=yes|frame-align=center|frame-width=250|frame-height=245}}
|caption           = Highbury East ward boundaries from 2002 to 2022
|blank1_name       = ONS code
|blank1_info       = 00AUGD
|blank2_name       = GSS code
|blank2_info       = 05000372
}}
Highbury East was an electoral ward in the London Borough of Islington from 2002 to 2022. The ward was first used in the 2002 elections and last used at the 2018 elections. It returned councillors to Islington London Borough Council.

Islington council elections
2018 election
The election took place on 3 May 2018.
2014 election
The election took place on 22 May 2014.
2010 election
The election on 6 May 2010 took place on the same day as the United Kingdom general election.
2006 election
The election took place on 4 May 2006.
2002 election
The election took place on 2 May 2002.
